Name: Isis Amulet with Chain of General Undjedbauendjed
Description: This amulet of General Undjedbauendjed is in the shape of a standing figure of Isis. She is shown here as a woman with two horns over her head flanking the solar disk. Isis is wearing a tripartite wig with a protective uraeus, or royal cobra, on the forehead. She is wearing a tight dress, a collar, and bracelets. It seems that she was holding the Shen sign.
